topic.title: Porn4All v2
topic.body:
Hello Fellas,

*Repost After credentials lost from:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit
/?Topic:1544291978_17DRx3kjQWBMajKngeAidepNDt9boMZtTG/Porn+for+all+ALL
( After an admiteddly good feedback from u Guys! )

This is ggcrowls,I come to the wonderful ZeroNet community with a unique
offer for YOU,and lots of love.
Jerking off is good for our health,and better is to do so with the material
that fullfils YOU!
Over the years,I have gathered a great matter of material of all natures,
as well as many(many) premiumships in pretty much all kinds of tubes,
which I have always shared with my friends and sometimes nice strangers
on the internetz.
A friend of mine recently,after I handed him a very nice "load" (ha-ha),
gave me the idea to share that stuff safely,making some cash on the side.
I never liked to take money for something as basic as all human needs are,
but times are hard.
My pruposal is:

1)You send me and list of your kinks 
(encrypted with my PubPGP key)
2)I send you a FREE sample, and give you a price for the full pack
(depending on the availability I have).
3)If you like what you see, you send me 50% of the price we've agreed on.
(all transactions will be made through monero)
4)I send you all the material
5)You send me the other 50%

Now,I know some bastards may never complete the half 50%, but sometimes
im really hopefull,and this is one of them,people are nice.
I also seriously believe needs should be relieved, no matter their nature.
Ive had perfectly well and civilized friends ask me for all the mor1alfag 
no-no shit,I would always come forwards and greet them with gratitude for 
trusting me,and try my best.
You can only imagine what is in my library...
(Or you can't! Just ask me!)

Everything will be done manually,so expect some reasonable latency, at least
before you deposit the first 50%.

Go ahead, ask me any questions,dont be shy.

Email: davem@zeroid.bit
Clearnet (same): ggcrowls@protonmail.com

1550597342_16TToFo5raRSGVEXVccktskzV6oU6.body:
> [sirlotaplot](#comment_1_18UukzxVzEwd9ugyvKWYe2vud77GyL72Px): Some of us just make everything we have available for free. I also seriously doubt you're gonna give anyone anything after they send you the first 50% in good faith. But to each their own.

Hello my friend,

As I explained above, I'm just trying to make some extra bucks off the thing I love ! 
We gotta revolutionize the way we make transactions !
We gotta also make a living... 
Also, as I trust YOU to make the 3rd payment, YOU trust ME to make the 2nd ;) Not really shady I think !

> [milsa](#comment_1_15bLBru45izZhY5VurHzoSt77YgDyYvode): 10/10! this guy is quite insane!

Thank You ! 
Happy to please YOU !

> [f821](#comment_1_1DnzzzyUTVaegFxtr5pVrVyppz1j3hXGpR): can confirm, man takes some time but his stuff is strong 10/10


Thank You !

> [fknsa666](#comment_1_14hS9hXdDg8ho7bcwaasVApj9XubeHoLWg): FUCK THIS GUY.SENT 1st SAMPLE GOOD BUT NEVER SEND REST AFTER MONEY !!!==== SCAM ====

Hello, You should have just received the rest of the arranged files.
I'm sorry for any latency on  my part.
